name: Hungry Mood
description:
Are you in the mood for food? These guinea pigs (and a hamster) sure are! Guide the rascally rodents through 4 levels filled with their favorite treats to help them satisfy their cravings.

Touch the food to eat it.

Forgot your mood? Open the menu (X or Esc by default) and choose "View Mood".

Hold "Shift" or go to the options and turn on "Always Dash" to run.

Made for Sacramento Developer Collective No Code Game Jam 2020.
